sentences.en: Behind the row of mulberry trees were paddy fields.
sentences.cn: 那一片桑树背后就是稻田.

sentences.en: Dry land has been turned into paddy fields.
If only he and Paddy got on better together!
sentences.cn: 要是他能和帕迪和平共处那该有多好!

sentences.en: Its artistic value failed to move Paddy Clegg. "I don't know what all the fuss is about. I didn't rate it at all," he said.
sentences.cn: 它的艺术价值没能打动帕迪·克莱格。“我不知道这样大惊小怪是为什么。我一点儿也不看好它，”他说道。

sentences.en: Now that their children have grown up she joins Paddy in London every other week.
sentences.cn: 他们的孩子都长大了，她便每隔一周就到伦敦帕迪那里。

sentences.en: Ordinary shoes are not appropriate to paddy fields.
Paddy spotted Mary Ann and gave her a cheery wave.
sentences.cn: 帕迪看到玛丽·安后高兴地冲她挥挥手。

sentences.en: She adored Paddy but he didn't treat her well.
sentences.cn: 她深爱帕迪，但他对她却并不好。

sentences.en: The air was heavy with the aroma of the paddy fields.
The ears of paddy are ripe and golden.
The news put him in a bit of a paddy.
The paddy fields looked like carpets of fresh green.
sentences.cn: 稻田像一片片翠绿的地毯.

sentences.en: The water buffalo squelched up and down the paddy fields, pulling the plough.
sentences.cn: 水牛拉着犁,在稻田里咕唧咕唧地走着.

sentences.en: This plot of paddy doesn't seem to be any worse than that one.
sentences.cn: 这片稻子不见得比那片差.

sentences.en: Workers were singing as they tilled the rice paddy fields.
sentences.cn: 劳动者们一边耕犁稻田一边唱歌。

trans.tran_en: a field in which rice is grown in water
